From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2022 film directed by Satramm Ramani


Tara Vs BilalTheatrical release posterDirected bySamar IqbalWritten bySanyukta ShaikhProduced byBhushan KumarKrishan KumarJohn AbrahamStarringHarshvardhan RaneSonia RatheeCinematographyAmarjeet SinghEdited byDipika KalraMusic byManan BhardwajProductioncompaniesT-Series FilmsJA EntertainmentTVB FilmsDistributed byAA FilmsRelease date
28 October 2022 (2022-10-28)
Running time126 minutes[1]CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Tara Vs Bilal is a 2022 Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy film directed by Samar Iqbal, starring Harshvardhan Rane and Sonia Rathee.[2][3] The story revolves around two leading characters who enter a fake marriage and later fall in love.
Tara Vs Bilal was released on 28 October 2022.[4]


Cast[edit]
Harshvardhan Rane as Advocate Bilal "Billu" Khan
Sonia Rathee as Tara Kaul Sharma Khan
Raheem Mir as Ritesh Shah (Ritz)
Pranay Manchanda as Dr. Jignesh "Jiggy"
Shammi Aulakh as Imran Khan, Bilal's father
Soundtrack[edit]
Tara Vs BilalSoundtrack album by Manan BhardwajReleased4 November 2022[5]GenreFeature film soundtrackLength14:27LabelT-SeriesOfficial audioTara Vs Bilal- Full Album on YouTube

The music was composed and lyrics written by Manan Bhardwaj.[5]

Track listingNo.TitleSinger(s)Length1."Teri Ho Gayi"Master Saleem, Faridkot3:242."Nichod Dunga"Manan Bhardwaj[6]2:583."Saiyaan Ji"Romy, Manan Bhardwaj4:034."Sau Rab Di"Jubin Nautiyal, Manan Bhardwaj, Purvashi Grover4:02Total length:14:27
Production[edit]
The principal photography of the film started in mid-October 2021.[7]

^ "T-Series, John Abraham to co-produce new film 'Tara vs Bilal'". Mint. 30 August 2022. Archived from the original on 1 January 2023. Retrieved 1 January 2023.

^ "John Abraham-backed 'Tara vs Bilal' to release on October 28". Zee News. 7 October 2022. Archived from the original on 4 November 2022. Retrieved 1 January 2023.

^ a b "Tara Vs Bilal– Original Motion Picture Soundtrack". JioSaavn. 4 November 2022. Archived from the original on 1 January 2023. Retrieved 1 January 2023.

^ "John Abraham's production Tara Vs Bilal starring Harshvardhan Rane and Sonia Rathee goes on floors". Bollywood Hungama. 18 October 2021. Archived from the original on 22 October 2022. Retrieved 1 January 2023.
